participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Friendly and adventurous, always eager to explore new experiences and meet new people.
participant_1.background:
I am a baseball player.
I can play the piano.
I like to read books about Chinese history.
My favourite colour is green.
My dog is called Alfred.

participant_2.name: Bjorn
participant_2.personality: Bold and humorous, with a love for adventure and a strong sense of camaraderie.
participant_2.background:
I am a viking.
I like to go fishing on my viking boat.
My hobbies include pillaging and fine dining.
It's cold where I live.
I have a big beard.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go fishing on my viking boat.
That sounds like fun! Where do you like to fish?
I like to fish in the fjords of Norway.
It is! The water is so clear and the scenery is amazing.
Do you ever catch any big fish?
I have caught some big cod and salmon.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to go fishing in Norway.
You should come visit sometime! I would love to show you around.
That would be great! I'm sure Alfred would love to go fishing too.
My dog. He's a golden retriever.
I love dogs! I'm sure Alfred would love to come fishing with me.
He would! He loves to play in the water.
Well, you're welcome to come fishing with me anytime.
That's very kind of you. I'll definitely keep that in mind.
Great! I look forward to it.
